text: Carlton Lee Haselrig (January 22, 1966 â€“ July 22, 2020) was an American heavyweight wrestler and NFL player. Haselrig wrestled for University of Pittsburgh at Johnstown. Haselrig then moved on to professional football, where he played five seasons in the NFL. He played for the Pittsburgh Steelers and the New York Jets. Haselrig was born in Johnstown, Pennsylvania. Haselrig died on July 22, 2020 in Johnstown, aged 54.Former Steeler, Pitt-Johnstown wrestler Carlton Haselrig dies at 54, coroner says ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Pittsburgh Steelers players Category:New York Jets players Category:American professional wrestlers Category:American mixed martial artists Category:Sportspeople from Pittsburgh Category:People from Johnstown, Pennsylvania
title: Carlton Haselrig
